title: 1911 Piedmont Cigarette Slide and Shell Box w/Cigs - $150 shipped
author: canjond

posts.post_title: 1911 Piedmont Cigarette Slide and Shell Box w/Cigs - $150 shipped
posts.post_content:
I have an extra 1911 Piedmont cigarette slide and shell box available for sale.  The box is in very good condition overall.  Has a beautiful 1910 tax stamp on back with what appears to be a 1911 overprint (although the ink is a little difficult to read - see the photo below).  The pack also retains a few original cigarettes.

$150 shipped.
